pullRequest.title: Response server common module implementation with dockerfile
pullRequest.bodyText: Response server common module implementation with dockerfile

commit.message: Moving response-server-ws to response-module. Associated changes to pom file, added one set of tests, removed HealthController (as it is in common-module now), mockit property files.
modified Dockerfile for new folder structure to include common module implementation
Commit ActiveFiltre change that was breaking the integration tests. This has been doen in PR #653

Update ActiveUserFilter.java

Fixed conditional property
response server common module implementaion with updated docker file
modified linter yml file as per new folder structure
Fixed issue with /v1 being appended to teh URL, that was breaking test cases.
change the reporter to review to fix the linter check failed issue fix
Merge branch 'response-server-module' of https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/fda-mystudies into response-server-module

nodes.bodyText:
why this line is added and commented out?
If it is not needed, please remove this line; same with the other commented  line below.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+FROM mohankgonthina/commonmodule:latest AS maven_builder
+COPY response-server-service /app/response-server-module/response-server-service
+COPY pom.xml /app/response-server-module/
+WORKDIR /app/response-server-module/
+RUN mvn clean package
+
+From tomcat:9.0.33-jdk11-openjdk
+#RUN rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/*

commit.message: removed commented line and formated pom.xml file

nodes.bodyText:
[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
Import statement for 'org.junit.Assert.assertNotNull' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.

[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
Import statement for 'org.springframework.test.web.servlet.request.MockMvcRequestBuilders.get' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.

[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
Import statement for 'org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result.MockMvcResultHandlers.print' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.

[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
Import statement for 'org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result.MockMvcResultMatchers.jsonPath' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.

[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
Import statement for 'org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result.MockMvcResultMatchers.status' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.

[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
'@' has incorrect indentation level 2, expected level should be 4.
